metadata.name: 3 Rivers Stadium Implosion - 2001
metadata.description: To make room for the new stadiums one for the Steelers and another for the Pirates the city had to destroy the old stadium that was shared by both teams. On February 11, 2001, at 8 am. The city imploded the stadium with a professional team to control the blast. The photo was taken with a Sony Mavica set on multi-image which created a 9-scene photo.
